{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS BRT-AC828M2.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC2600 Dual WAN VPN Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = |pp = https://www.asus.com/Commercial-Networking/BRT-AC828/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/Commercial-Networking/BRT-AC828/HelpDesk/ |dl = |wikidevi = ASUS_BRT-AC828/M2 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = ASUS |model = BRT-AC828 |submodelappend = |submodel = /M2 |revision = (1.50) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2600 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = 90IG01T0-BM3000 |fcc_id = MSQ-RT0V00 |icid = 3568A-RT0V00 |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8065; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7-A |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F1G08ABBEAH4; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = |flash2type = |fla2_num = |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L6445EM2I-10G; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16FP-DI; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8033; |eth2chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8033; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8370MB; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.103;; |exp_if_types = USB 3.0, M.2 SSD slot |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.37 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, SLA, Link Aggregation, |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = AC828M2, AC828M2_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/01/2015 |estreldate = 05/31/2016 |estprice = 432 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833320359 |asin = B071VCVQ54 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B076ZXSDZB |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = China |buttons = WPS Button, Reset Button, Power Button, Power Switch, USB eject |led = |dimensions = 1.95" x 7.87" x 11.81" |weight = 2.09 lbs. |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Manuf P/N: '''90IG01T0-BU2000 / 90IG01T0-BM3000''' *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RT0V00 MSQ-RT0V00] (2016-08-11) PCB REV 1.50 :Because M.2 SSD (42/60/80) is assigned to port 3 :and ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 doesn't have SD card slot. {{FCC ST|11/09/2016|indexme.}} {{see also|Synology RT2600ac|Netgear R7800}} *'''Stable Wi-Fi Range''' - Fast, stable Wi-Fi throughout your office with :4x4 MIMO antenna design and ASUS AiRadar beamforming *'''Hardware Dual-WAN''' - Dual physical WAN ports for ultimate speed and :reliability, with up to 2Gbps aggregated bandwidth and failover capability *'''M.2 Slot for Faster Storage''' - Internal M.2 SATA slot for networked SSD storage *'''Easy Management''' - Grow business with Captive Portal to set up customer Wi-Fi :and manage your network with convenient Device Grouping and RADIUS server *'''Improved Network Safety''' - Protect sensitive company information with AiProtection, :VLAN, hardware crypto engine IPsec VPN, all without sacrificing working efficiency. *'''Up to 250 Simultaneous Client Connections''' - MU-MIMO design and robust :connectivity for the most demanding environments *'''Teaming Support''' - Up to 4Gbps LAN connections (Link Aggregation 802.3ad) ===Specifications=== *Processor: @1.7 GHz dual-core ([[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065) *Memory: 128MB (SPI/NAND) flash and 512MB (DDR3) RAM *Wi-Fi technology: Quad-Stream, Wave2 (160 MHz), MU-MIMO *Wi-Fi speeds: up to 2.53Gbps (1733+800 Mbps) *Four (4x) external antennas, Twin (2x) USB 3.0 ports *Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50/60 Hz) :DC Output: 19V with max. 2.37A (3.42A) current *Dimensions: 190mm x 300mm x 49.5mm (WxDxH) (Without Bezel) *Weight: 950g ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> |
############################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros little-endian ARM platform, linux-3.4.x
# SOC: IPQ8064
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	SPI, NAND
# Valild option for WIFI_CHIP are shown below:
#	BEELINER, CASCADE
# Valid option for SWITCH_CHIP are shown below:
#	QCA8337N
#	RTL8370M_PHY_QCA8033_X2		(BRT-AC828 SR1~3, REV 1.00 ~ 1.20)
#	RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2	(BRT-AC828 SR4 or above, REV 1.30+)
# Valid option for IPSEC are shown below:
#	OPENSWAN, QUICKSEC, STRONGSWAN or y

export BRT-AC828 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y QCA=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=3.6.x MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=n USB="USB" GRO=y APP="installed" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="BRT-AC828" 
  BRTAC828=y SHP=y NVRAM_SIZE=0x20000 ODMPID=y UBI=y DUAL_TRX=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y 
  DEBUGFS=y SSH=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y FINDASUS=y IPSEC=STRONGSWAN STAINFO=y CAPTIVE_PORTAL=y \
	WEBDAV=n SWEBDAVCLIENT=n DROPBOXCLIENT=n FTPCLIENT=n SAMBACLIENT=n \
	NTFS="tuxera" TFAT=y HFS="tuxera" DISK_MONITOR=y \
	MTWANCFG=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND WIFI_CHIP=CASCADE SWITCH_CHIP=RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2 WANPORT2=y PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y M2_SSD=y \
	BLINK_LED=y WANRED_LED=y PWRRED_LED=y FO_LED=y EJUSB_BTN=y \
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y DISABLE_REPEATER_UI=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y ATF=y \
	UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS=""

export RT-AC88N := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y QCA=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=3.6.x MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" GRO=y APP="installed" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC88N" 
  RTAC88N=y SHP=y NVRAM_SIZE=0x20000 NTFS="open" ODMPID=y UBI=y DUAL_TRX=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y 
  DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y SSH=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y FINDASUS=y STAINFO=y \
	WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y DROPBOXCLIENT=y FTPCLIENT=y SAMBACLIENT=y \
	MTWANCFG=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=NAND WIFI_CHIP=CASCADE SWITCH_CHIP=QCA8337N PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y \
	BLINK_LED=y \
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y ATF=y \
	UBIFS=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS=""

export RT-AC88S := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y QCA=y BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=3.6.x MEDIASRV=y MODEM=y MODEMPIN=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" GRO=y APP="network" AUTODICT=y LANWAN_LED=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC88S" RTAC88S=y 
  SHP=y NVRAM_SIZE=0x10000 NTFS="open" ODMPID=y EXT4FS=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y MDNS=y DUALWAN=y DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y DEBUGFS=y SSH=y 
  REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y FINDASUS=y STAINFO=y \
	WEBDAV=y SMARTSYNCBASE=y \
	MTWANCFG=y \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI WIFI_CHIP=CASCADE SWITCH_CHIP=RTL8370MB_PHY_QCA8033_X2 PWRSAVE=y \
	XHCI=y ATEUSB3_FORCE=y \
	BLINK_LED=y WANRED_LED=y PWRRED_LED=y FO_LED=y EJUSB_BTN=y \
	REPEATER=y PROXYSTA=y USER_LOW_RSSI=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y ATF=y \
	JFFS2=y PSISTLOG=y \
	TEMPROOTFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS=""
}} ==Links of Interest== [https://www.asus.com/Commercial-Networking/BRT-AC828/specifications/ Specifications] ===News=== *[http://press.asus.com/PressReleases/p/ASUS-Announces-Latest-Line-up-of-Lifestyle-and-Gaming-Innovations-at-Computex-2016 ''ASUS Announces Latest Line-up of Lifestyle and Gaming
Innovations at Computex 2016'' - Press release on '''ASUS'''] *[http://press.asus.com/release.php?id=87 ''ASUS Wins 16 Awards at Computex 2016'' - PR on '''ASUS'''] *[http://www.asus.com/News/PXhfwKFxpFhcFz0t/ ''News: ASUS Devices at Computex 2016'' - PR on '''ASUS'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32848-synology-formally-announces-its-wireless-router ''Synology Formally Announces Its Wireless Router'' on '''SNB'''] *[http://www.techbang.com/posts/43745-2016-computer-d ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2'' on '''Techbang'''] (Computex 2016) *[http://ifworlddesignguide.com/entry/199723-brt-ac828m2 ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2'' on '''iF WDG'''] (Computex 2016) ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-brt-ac828-wireless-ac2600-dual-wan-vpn-router.32839/ ''New ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] :*CPU: QCA IPQ8065 @1.7GHz dual core ARM (Krait 300) :*Memory: 128MB Flash and 512MB RAM (DDR3) :*Wi-Fi: 2x QCA9984 4T4R, Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160 ::160MHz for both 2.4GHz and 5GHz (80MHz+80MHz) :*Ports: 2x WAN (2x QCA8033), 8x LAN (RTL8370MB), 2x USB 3.0 *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bmaylyn-networking-preview%5D-asus-brt-ac828m2-router-5380402.html ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] :*HW NAT: Fully HW NAT dual WAN for Internet speeds up to 2Gbps ::with 8x backbone GbE LAN ports with 2x set of bonding ports ::Dedicated QCA HW AES/3DES/SHA crypto accelerator engine. :*Support Failover, Teaming on SLA, 802.3ad Aggregation :*Support SATA/AHCI M.2 SSD up to 500GB size available ::The M.2 SSD slot allows 42/60/80mm type of M.2 SSD *[http://www.mobile01.com/topicdetail.php?f=110&t=4817952 ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 VPN Router'' on '''Mobile01''' forums] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1409-asus-brt-ac828m2-z-dwoma-portami-wan-dla-zastosowań-biznesowych/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Rewiews=== BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''Einfold'''] *[http://www.blacktubi.com/review/asus-brt-ac828-business-router-review/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''Blacktubi'''] *[https://www.geeklingo.net/asus-brt-ac828-ac2600-dual-wan-vpn-wi-fi-router-reviewed/ ''ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 Router'' on '''GeekLingo'''] ==Pictures== :LAN: RTL8370M/QCA8033 x2 (SR1~SR3, REV 1.00~1.20) *ASUS BRT-AC828/M2 - [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 :LAN: RTL8370MB/QCA8033 x2 (SR4 or above, REV 1.30+) *[[ASUS RT-AC88S]] - [[Qualcomm]]
